Operation 'getUser' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Missing summary entirely. Current description is verbose, contains HTML markup, and lacks clarity on inputs/outputs for AI agents. Improved version: (1) adds concise summary, (2) removes HTML markup for better parsing, (3) clearly specifies authentication requirement and scope dependency, (4) explicitly names response schema (UserResponse), (5) clarifies that returned fields vary by scope and account type, (6) maintains domain terminology (OAuth2, scopes, BusinessAccount, IndividualAccount) consistent with API context, (7) improves AI agent interpretability by clearly stating when/how to use this operation.

data.current_description:
This method retrieves the account profile information for an authenticated user, which requires a User access token. What is returned is controlled by the scopes.

For a business account you use the default scope commerce.identity.readonly, which returns all the fields in the businessAccount container. These are returned because this is all public information.

For an individual account, the fields returned in the individualAccount container are based on the scope you use. Using the default scope, only public information, such as eBay user ID, are returned. For details about what each scope returns, see the Identity API Overview.

In the Sandbox, this API returns mock data. Note: You must use the correct scope or scopes for the data you want returned.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the authenticated user's account profile information including personal and business account details. Requires OAuth2 User access token with appropriate scopes (commerce.identity.readonly for business accounts, or scope-dependent for individual accounts). Returns a UserResponse object containing either BusinessAccount or IndividualAccount information based on account type and authorized scopes. Returned fields are controlled by the scopes provided - default scope returns public information only. Note: Sandbox returns mock data.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Current description is verbose, contains HTML markup, and lacks clarity on inputs/outputs for AI agents.
